decisions.what: Good Chop will not show future deliveries beyond next box until Q2 2026 dashboard release
decisions.context: Testing showed future box display led to increased Cancellations and Pauses, making it CVA negative. Also limited by legacy Whitelabel dashboard constraints and strategic pivot to e-commerce model

decisions.what: TPT to initiate price testing in Q4, requiring collaboration with Pricing team for price sets implementation
decisions.context: Hot debate topic around prioritization of TPT in BE implementation roadmap

decisions.what: Customer Care team implementing unified 'contact us' page with T&Cs at top across all brands
decisions.context: Legal requirement, though team agrees placement and wording could be improved

entities.name: Good Chop
entities.context: Digital butcher brand needing funnel dashboard, operating on legacy Whitelabel dashboard, planning Q2 2026 dashboard release with Future Boxes feature

entities.name: TPT (The Pets Table)
entities.context: Pet food brand planning price testing in Q4, has referrals program, working on adjust daily calories feature

entities.name: VMS
entities.context: Has data backlog spreadsheet, Q1 2026 roadmap, and OKR tracker being updated

entities.name: HelloFresh (HF)
entities.context: Has contact page with missing ingredients component, demoing free add-on pop up for Reactivations

entities.name: Factor75
entities.context: Already has updated contact us page layout live with T&Cs at top

entities.name: CMA
entities.context: Creating Q1 2026 Plan, holding Thursday workshop

entities.name: Whitelabel
entities.context: Shared legacy dashboard infrastructure that Good Chop is migrating away from

entities.name: Statsig
entities.context: Experimentation platform with delayed gross_activations metric causing CVR calculation issues

entities.name: Lokalize
entities.context: Tool that team members may have access to

entities.name: U03TY4YJU4X
entities.context: Product lead coordinating Q1 planning, OKR tracking, PA contractor funding, and team activities

entities.context: Product analyst creating PA task lists, running analyses for OKR numbers, working on TPT features

entities.name: U01AKGWGLC8
entities.context: Product manager for Good Chop/HF, created party planning form, sharing AWS culture article

entities.name: U09D8BZ9891 (Simon)
entities.context: Working on VMS, picked up first data backlog item, updating OKR tracker

entities.name: U07VDFEFBQU

blockers.description: PA tickets not being picked up despite clear descriptions and delivery dates, prioritization meetings cancelled in last 3 weeks
blockers.impact: PA work for GoC/TPT was stalled, now creating prioritized list

blockers.description: Limited design capacity to improve contact us page layout
blockers.impact: Cannot immediately improve T&Cs placement that all stakeholders agree needs work

blockers.description: Statsig gross_activations metric is delayed, causing CVR calculation issues on reload
blockers.impact: Can significantly impact experiment CVR numbers and decision-making

blockers.description: TPT price testing needs BE prioritization for price sets implementation
blockers.impact: Blocks Q4 price testing initiative for TPT

blockers.description: Struggling to calculate cumulative CVA and CR impacts due to less PA capacity
blockers.impact: 2025 OKR tracking for GoC and TPT incomplete

action_items.task: Create prioritized list of PA tasks
Consolidate PA priorities into shared spreadsheet
Share Q1 2026 roadmaps for CMA planning workshop
Run analyses to finalize CVA numbers for 2025 OKRs
Check if designer time can be freed up for contact us page improvements
Start conversation between 4 stakeholders about contact us page improvements
Add demo submission for adjust daily calories feature
action_items.due: for upcoming or next demo session

action_items.task: Demo free add-on pop up for Reactivations in HT Demo

key_context.summary: Team is getting PA contractor funded by GoC/TPT to address backlog of product analytics work. Created prioritized lists including funnel dashboard for Good Chop, OTP support analysis, and two-week cadence deep dive.
key_context.relevance: Critical for unblocking data analysis and experimentation work across brands

key_context.summary: CMA initiating Q1 2026 planning process with Thursday workshop. Teams sharing roadmaps for TPT and VMS, focusing on customer problems and objectives from domain objectives.
key_context.relevance: Sets strategic direction and resource allocation for next quarter

key_context.summary: Good Chop migrating from legacy Whitelabel dashboard to new system. Q2 2026 release will add Future Boxes, Add-on Upselling, and Premium Swaps. Current limitation on showing future deliveries is due to CVA-negative test results and technical constraints.
key_context.relevance: Major product evolution affecting subscription management and customer experience

key_context.summary: Customer Care team rolling out unified contact page across brands with T&Cs at top (legal requirement). Already live on Factor75, but stakeholders agree placement needs improvement.
key_context.relevance: Affects customer support experience and legal compliance across all brands

key_context.summary: Team struggling to calculate cumulative CVA and CR impacts for 2025 OKRs due to reduced PA capacity. Considering whether to review/update OKRs for brands based on current work priorities.
key_context.relevance: Impacts ability to measure success and may require strategic adjustments

key_context.summary: Critical discovery that gross_activations metric in Statsig is delayed, causing allocation numbers to update on reload while conversion numbers stay same, significantly impacting CVR calculations.
key_context.relevance: Could lead to incorrect experiment conclusions and poor product decisions

key_context.summary: TPT planning Q4 price testing requiring collaboration with Pricing team for price sets enablement. Currently discussing prioritization in BE implementation roadmap.
key_context.relevance: Hot debate topic that could impact TPT revenue optimization strategy

summary: New Ventures Product team coordinating Q1 2026 planning, addressing PA capacity constraints through contractor funding, and managing cross-brand initiatives including Good Chop dashboard migration, TPT price testing, and unified contact page rollout while tracking OKRs and resolving experimentation platform issues.
